title: attestations not getting generated sometimes because state is too far behind
body:
connected to 64 peers, and not able to produce attestations was reported. logs show the following. There seems to be a large number of empty blocks in the log.

from teku discord: https://gist.github.com/J2R5M3/5d6fcbee36c0a806feb3a30d706eaf9c

```
2020-08-12 18:20:24.073-06:00 | TimeTickChannel-0 | INFO  | teku-event-log | [37mSlot Event  *** Slot: 61001, Block:    ... empty, Epoch: 1906, Finalized checkpoint: 1903, Finalized root: c9927d..0d6f, Peers: 30[0m
```
